title: Video-Based Elementary Engineering Education Design and Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Scientific Principles and Engineering Concepts
context.additional_context: Training program for pre-service teachers on designing elementary engineering curricula and video-based instructional methods. Conducted in non-real-time online environments using personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Core elements of elementary engineering education (engineering design process, problem-solving strategies) can be explained with at least 80% accuracy
Design and implement at least three instructional strategies to deliver engineering concepts to elementary learners using video-based learning materials
Develop evaluation criteria for video content to enhance engineering career awareness and receive suitability ratings of at least 85% in actual application cases
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
